title: Vehicle Product
description: For vehicle product information such as category, number of doors, capacity, and ownership.

xdm:color.title: Color
xdm:color.description: Captures the color of the vehicle.

xdm:inventoryType.title: Inventory Type
xdm:inventoryType.description: Captures the inventory type of the vehicle.

xdm:luggageCapacity.title: Luggage Capacity
xdm:luggageCapacity.description: Number of pieces of luggage that fit in the vehicle.

xdm:make.title: Make
xdm:make.description: Captures the make of the vehicle.

xdm:mileage.title: Mileage
xdm:mileage.description: Captures the current mileage of a vehicle.

xdm:model.title: Model
xdm:model.description: Captures the model of the vehicle.

xdm:numberOfDoors.title: Number of Doors
xdm:numberOfDoors.description: How many operating doors the vehicle has.

xdm:options.title: Options
xdm:options.description: Captures an array of strings detailing vehicle options, such as heated seats, moonroof, navigation system, manual transmission, etc.

xdm:passengerCapacity.title: Passenger Capacity
xdm:passengerCapacity.description: Number of passengers that fit in the vehicle.

xdm:postalCode.title: Postal Code
xdm:postalCode.description: Captures the postal code where the vehicle resides.

xdm:starRating.title: Star Rating
xdm:starRating.description: Star rating associated with the vehicle.

xdm:style.title: Style
xdm:style.description: Captures the style of the vehicle, such as 2WD, 4WD, 2 Door Coupe, 4 Door Sedan, Convertible, etc.

xdm:trim.title: Trim
xdm:trim.description: Captures the trim level or series of the vehicle.

xdm:vehicleCategory.title: Vehicle Category
xdm:vehicleCategory.description: Vehicle category such as sedan, coupe, sports, station wagon, hatchback, convertible, etc.

xdm:vin.title: Vehicle Identification Number
xdm:vin.description: Captures the vehicle identification number (VIN) of the vehicle.

xdm:year.title: Year
xdm:year.description: Captures the model year of the vehicle.
